meanings.sent1: The surfeited cat refused to eat any more treats.
meanings.sent2: After the feast, the surfeited guests could barely move.
meanings.sent3: The surfeited puppy rolled over, unable to play anymore.
meanings.sent4: The surfeited garden bloomed with an abundance of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The surfeited child fell asleep surrounded by toys.

meanings.sent1: The surfeited child had no interest in dessert after the huge meal.
meanings.sent2: The surfeited audience clapped enthusiastically at the end of the show.
meanings.sent3: The surfeited cat lazily stretched out in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The surfeited market was flooded with goods of all kinds.
meanings.sent5: The surfeited traveler was content to stay in and rest.

meanings.definition: Having consumed to the point of excess
meanings.sent1: The surfeited bear slept soundly after eating all the honey.
meanings.sent2: The surfeited student struggled to stay awake during class.
meanings.sent3: The surfeited squirrel stored nuts for later, not wanting to eat more.
meanings.sent4: The surfeited river overflowed its banks after heavy rains.
meanings.sent5: The surfeited partygoers danced until dawn, full of energy.
